This soft white blind offers just the right amount of thermal protection without sacrificing any natural light. White creates a clean and crisp look, favoured for being the easiest colour to work with when designing a room.

products.description: Rio blackout solar is a honeycomb blackout pleated fabric, available in a wide range of tropical colours with an added bonus of a solar silver backing to block harmful uv rays. This soft almost magnolia cream shade, can be paired with any coloured accessories for a summery vibe, or cream walls for a warmer feel. Raio vanilla is a great addition to a kitchen or conervatory with plants to help dress the room.
